lead_paragraph: The latest housing data was more upbeat, and consumer confidence rose in August. But traders were still concerned about Friday’s jobs report.
snippet: The latest housing data was more upbeat, and consumer confidence rose in August. But traders were still concerned about Friday’s jobs report.

headline.main: A Flat Day but a Down Month on Wall Street
headline.seo: Wall Street Indexes Struggle for a Direction
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Indexes Struggle for a Direction
